title: Canadian Dairy Commission announces second farm gate price increase for 2022 | CTV News - CTV News Calgary
content:
The price of milk in Canada is on the rise again with the second increase this year set to take place in September. 
The farm gate price will increase by about two cents per litre as of Sept. 1, an … [+2193 chars]

title: ‘My responsibility’: tracing the graves of early black settlers in Canada
content:
On a quiet weekday afternoon, James Russell knelt down in a grassy field and planted a tiny Canadian flag. When he stood up and looked around, 27 other little flags fluttered in the wind.
